classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with weapons and armor. Fighters excel in physical confrontations and are versatile warriors, able to wield a variety of weapons and armors.
traits: Second Wind: Regain health in battle.
Action Surge: Take an extra action during combat.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A priestly champion wielding divine magic. Clerics act as intermediaries between the mortal world and the gods, often serving a specific deity.
traits: Channel Divinity: Turn undead or empower spells.
Divine Domain: Choose a domain like Life, War, or Trickery.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath. Paladins combine martial prowess with divine power, often serving as protectors of justice and virtue.
traits: Lay on Hands: Heal others by touch.
Divine Smite: Deal radiant damage to enemies.

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: A fierce warrior who can enter a battle rage. Barbarians are primal combatants with extraordinary resilience and strength.
traits: Rage: Increase damage and resistance during combat.
Unarmored Defense: Use Constitution for better armor.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: A wielder of magic derived from a pact with an otherworldly being. Warlocks have unique abilities granted by their patrons.
traits: Eldritch Invocations: Customize your magical powers.
Pact Boon: Gain abilities like a summoned weapon or familiar.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: A skilled hunter and tracker, adept in the wilderness. Rangers are excellent at ranged combat and survival.
traits: Favored Enemy: Gain bonuses against specific creatures.
Natural Explorer: Excel in chosen terrains.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating reality. Wizards are the ultimate spellcasters, with access to a vast array of spells.
traits: Arcane Recovery: Regain spell slots during a rest.
Spellbook: Learn and prepare more spells than other classes.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: A spellcaster who draws magic from innate ability. Sorcerers have a natural talent for spellcasting, often due to magical lineage.
traits: Metamagic: Modify spells to suit your needs.
Sorcerer Points: Fuel unique magical effects.

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: A master of martial arts and spiritual discipline. Monks are quick and deadly, relying on unarmed strikes and inner energy.
traits: Ki Points: Perform extraordinary actions in combat.
Unarmored Movement: Increase speed without armor.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery. Rogues excel at precision strikes and avoiding harm.
traits: Sneak Attack: Deal extra damage with finesse weapons.
Evasion: Avoid area-of-effect damage.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: A protector of nature, capable of shapeshifting. Druids wield nature-based magic and can transform into animals.
traits: Wild Shape: Transform into beasts.
Spellcasting: Use nature-based spells.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: A performer who weaves magic through music and storytelling. Bards are versatile spellcasters with abilities to inspire and charm.
traits: Bardic Inspiration: Boost allies' abilities.
Jack of All Trades: Add bonuses to non-proficient skills.
